author: Iacoban, Anatolie (Nokia - RO/Timisoara)
description:
*** DEFAULT TEMPLATE for 2G-3G-4G-5G-SRAN-FDD-TDD-DCM-Micro-Controller common template v1.4.0 (02.07.2021) â€“ PLEASE FILL IT IN BEFORE CREATING A PR AND DO NOT CHANGE / REMOVE ANY SECTION OF THIS TEMPLATE ***

[1. Detail Test Steps:]
Both LTE and 5G BTS are onAIR;
Perform LTE site reset from WebEM;
[2. Expected Result:]
5G and LTE is on AIr;
All radio are on Air and call is possible;
Alarm No X2 link available for a specific LTEENB should be reported on 5G side and no other suspicious alarms .
[3. Actual Result:]
Alarm Fid 10 no connection to unit reported on all radio modules from 5G site
[4. Tester analysis:]
SW 5G : SBTS21B_ENB_0000_002175_000000;
SW LTE: SBTS22R2_ENB_0000_000995_000000;
LTE BTS is Sync Hub Master and System Radio Master.
Alarm FID 10 is reported on all radio modules from 5G site when LTE site reset is performed.
The issue occurs when NR is PL or LTE is PL.
Radio Link failure occured :
[SET15 ] f2 ASP-2734-2-syslog- 2022-03-17T09:09:21.937106Z 6D-syslog-proxy WRN/[cp_ue][108][108] SgnbModificationRequestService.cpp:246 [ueIdCu:0, gnbDuUeF1APId:1, menbUeX2APId:19, gnbDuId:0] Start UE initiated RadioLinkFailure handling with failureType t310Expiry, isIntraDu false
[SET15 ] fb ASP-2734-2-syslog- 2022-03-17T09:09:22.437277Z 6D-syslog-proxy WRN/[cp_ue][108][108] NsaRadioLinkFailureService.cpp:40 tWaitingRlRecover timeout: [ueIdCu:0, gnbDuUeF1APId:1, menbUeX2APId:19, gnbDuId:0]

The radios become onAIR  from 5G side when LTE is up.

[5. Pronto Creator Interface (PCI) information:]

PCI executed for Problem Report (17.03.2022, 11:44:51 UTC):
PCI ID: PCI_20220317_124429_000
MLoGIC model version: 1.0.0-alpha
Access PCI to check saved results: https://rep-portal.wroclaw.nsn-rdnet.net/pci/?pci_id=PCI_20220317_124429_000
